General.Name: Zyrexindo Mandiri Buana PT Tbk
General.Description: PT Zyrexindo Mandiri Buana Tbk engages in the production, assembly, and marketing of IT products in Indonesia. It operates through Mobile Computing Devices, IT Products, and Others segments. The company offers smartphones, tablets, laptops, desktops, servers, kiosks, digital signages, dual touchscreen monitors, IOT and accessories, and related accessories. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in West Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: No.59 Jl. Daan Mogot, Jakarta Barat, Indonesia, 11470
